titleStmt.title: Remarks on some eminent passages in the life of the famed Mr. Blood in a letter to a person of quality, written upon the occasion of the late tryall, relating to His Grace the Duke of Buckingham.
titleStmt.author: R. H.

notesStmt.note: Second ed. has title: Remarks on the life and death of the fam'd Mr. Blood.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
